titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation forbidding any of His Majesties subjects to assist the rebells with men, mony, armes, victualls, or intelligence, to stop any His Majesties messengers, or pacquets, or to offer violence to any His Majesties souldiers.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: "Given at our court at Oxford this eighteenth day of Iuly, in the ninteenth yeare of our raigne.".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
